resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105778</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105778</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204436</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Soil and erosion unit: Section 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Boden und Abnutzungmaßeinheit: Kapitel 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sol et unité d'érosion : Section 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Solo e unidade da erosão: Seção 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Terreno ed unità di erosione: Parte 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χώμα και μονάδα διάβρωσης: Παράγραφος 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Suelo y unidad de la erosión: Sección 1</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This two week unit will involve descriptive information on North Carolina soil types and how the presence of plants affects soil erosion. Upon completion of Section 1, you may continue to Section 2.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese zwei Woche Maßeinheit bezieht beschreibende
Informationen über Nord-Carolina Bodentypen mit ein und wie das 
Vorhandensein der Betriebe Bodenabnutzung beeinflußt. Nach 
Beendigung von Kapitel 1, können Sie zu Kapitel 2 fortfahren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette unité de deux semaines impliquera 
l'information descriptive sur les types du nord de sol de la 
Caroline et comment la présence des usines affecte l'érosion de sol.
Sur l'accomplissement de la section 1, vous pouvez continuer à 
la section 2.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta unidade de duas semanas envolverá a 
informação descritiva em tipos do solo de North.carolina e como a 
presença das plantas afeta a erosão do solo. Em cima da 
conclusão da seção 1, você pode continuar à seção 2.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa unità da due settimane coinvolgerà le 
informazioni descrittive sui tipi del terreno del North.carolina e 
come la presenza delle piante interessa l'erosione del terreno. 
A completamento della parte 1, potete continuare alla parte 2.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η μονάδα δύο εβδομάδων θα περιλάβει τις 
περιγραφικές πληροφορίες για τους εδαφολογικούς τύπους της 
βόρειας Καρολίνας και πώς η παρουσία εγκαταστάσεων έχει 
επιπτώσεις στην εδαφολογική διάβρωση. Με την ολοκλήρωση της 
παραγράφου 1, μπορείτε να συνεχιστείτε στην παράγραφο 2.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta unidad de dos semanas implicará la 
información descriptiva sobre tipos del suelo de Carolina del Norte y
cómo la presencia de plantas afecta la erosión del suelo. 
Sobre la terminación de la sección 1, usted puede continuar a 
la sección 2.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:AMY ROBERTSON
FN:AMY ROBERTSON
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105778</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/soil-and-erosion-unit-section-1</uri>
